participant_1.background:
I'm a passionate artist who's been through a lot in love, but I keep drawing and creating because it's my passion.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
i am a volunteer firefighter.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud that I'm able to use my creative talents to make clay sculptures that help raise awareness about animal welfare issues.
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.
I want to show my music to the world!
i sometimes wonder why i am not married.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.

content.text: I'm a passionate artist who's been through a lot in love, but I keep drawing and creating because it's my passion.
I'm proud that I'm able to use my creative talents to make clay sculptures that help raise awareness about animal welfare issues.
Cool! What kind of clay sculptures do you make?
I've made a lot of different kinds, but my favorite is one of a cat sitting on a rock.
Sounds cute! I love cats. I have two of my own.
Aw, that's awesome! I've always wanted a cat, but I'm allergic.
That's too bad. They're really great pets.
Yeah, I've heard. I'm hoping to eventually get over my allergy so I can have one.
I hope you do! They're so much fun to have around.
Thanks! I've been keeping my fingers crossed.
Well, I'm sure you'll be a great pet owner when you finally get one.
